name: Spanish Australian American (Fluorite & Australian Opal)
description: My composition choices are informed by the countries that are a large part of my life at the moment. They are also addressing the natural resources extracted from mineral-rich countries and the assignment to these inanimate objects, more rights and privileges to cross borders than some of the minority, marginalized, and vulnerable communities in those countries. This is also a reflection of the physical traits from different races recognizable and perpetually on display in one being. These racial signifiers, in some cases, reinforce essentialist, either/or thinking and harmful stereotypes, which can at times dictate who does or does not have the access to travel freely around the world.
